if.test: startTime!=null and startTime !=''and endTime != null and endTime !=''

mapper.select:
select t2."org_name" "orgName",t1."type_id" "typeId" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_org_mapper" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_org" t2 on t1."org_id" = t2."org_id" where t1."type"=#{type} and t1."type_id" in
#{assetsId}

select "assets_ip" as "ipAddress", "assets_name" as "assetsName", "disk_name" as "typeName", "disk_total" as "diskTotal", "disk_free" AS "diskFree" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_disk_allday" where "assets_id" in
#{item}
SELECT "parent_id","label" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanage_table" WHERE "id" = #{linkid}
SELECT "belong_time" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_assetsusability_report" where "belong_time" between #{startTime} and #{date} GROUP BY "belong_time"
SELECT "belong_time" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_run_time_status" where "belong_time" between #{startTime} and #{date} GROUP BY "belong_time"
select ${TBSNAME}."save_time" from "mw_linkflow_census_report" where type is null group by "save_time"
select "save_time" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cpuandmemory_report" where type is null group by "save_time"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${TBSNAME}."mw_mpls_history_report"("id","mpls_data", "save_time",link_name) VALUES (SEQ_MW_MPLS_HISTORY_REPORT.NEXTVAL,#{data}, #{saveTime},#{name});

INSERT INTO ${TBSNAME}."mw_mpls_history_report"(id,"send_data",accept_data, "save_time",link_name,sort_send_data,sort_accept_data) VALUES (SEQ_MW_MPLS_HISTORY_REPORT.NEXTVAL,#{sendData},#{acceptData}, #{saveTime},#{name},#{sortSendData},#{sortAcceptData});
mapper.select: select "save_time" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_mpls_history_report"
SELECT "id", "assetsId","assets_name","ip","assets_usability" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_assetsusability_report" WHERE "belong_time" between #{start} and #{end}
select "save_time" from ${TBSNAME}."${tableName}" group by "save_time" order by "save_time"
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO mw_runstate_weekly(host_id, asset_name, ip, item_name, max_value, min_value, avg_value, out_interface_avg_value, sort_last_avg_value,interface_name,disk_name,assetsId,save_time,update_success,week_date) VALUES
( #{list.hostId}, #{list.assetName}, #{list.ip}, #{list.itemName}, #{list.maxValue}, #{list.minValue}, #{list.avgValue}, #{list.outInterfaceAvgValue}, #{list.sortLastAvgValue}, #{list.interfaceName}, #{list.diskName}, #{list.assetsId}, #{list.saveTime}, #{list.updateSuccess}, #{weekDate} )

INSERT INTO mw_runstate_monthly(host_id, asset_name, ip, item_name, max_value, min_value, avg_value, out_interface_avg_value, sort_last_avg_value,interface_name,disk_name,assetsId,save_time,update_success,month_date) VALUES
( #{list.hostId}, #{list.assetName}, #{list.ip}, #{list.itemName}, #{list.maxValue}, #{list.minValue}, #{list.avgValue}, #{list.outInterfaceAvgValue}, #{list.sortLastAvgValue}, #{list.interfaceName}, #{list.diskName}, #{list.assetsId}, #{list.saveTime}, #{list.updateSuccess}, #{monthDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT "assetsId" "assetsId", "host_id" "hostId", "asset_name" "assetName", "ip", "item_name" "itemName", "max_value" "maxValue", "min_value" "minValue", "avg_value" "avgValue", "out_interface_avg_value" "outInterfaceAvgValue", "sort_last_avg_value" "sortLastAvgValue", "interface_name" "interfaceName", "disk_name" "diskName", "save_time" "saveTime" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_runstate_daily" WHERE "save_time" BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} AND "assetsId" IS NOT NULL

SELECT "assetsId" "assetsId", "host_id" "hostId", "asset_name" "assetName", "ip", "item_name" "itemName", "max_value" "maxValue", "min_value" "minValue", "avg_value" "avgValue", "out_interface_avg_value" "outInterfaceAvgValue", "sort_last_avg_value" "sortLastAvgValue", "interface_name" "interfaceName", "disk_name" "diskName", "save_time" "saveTime" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_runstate_weekly" WHERE "week_date" = #{weekDate} AND "assetsId" IS NOT NULL

SELECT "assetsId" "assetsId", "host_id" "hostId", "asset_name" "assetName", "ip", "item_name" "itemName", "max_value" "maxValue", "min_value" "minValue", "avg_value" "avgValue", "out_interface_avg_value" "outInterfaceAvgValue", "sort_last_avg_value" "sortLastAvgValue", "interface_name" "interfaceName", "disk_name" "diskName", "save_time" "saveTime" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_runstate_daily" WHERE "save_time" BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} AND "assetsId" IS NOT NULL and "item_name" = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "mw_mplshistory_daily"("send_data",accept_data, "save_time",link_name,sort_send_data,sort_accept_data,update_success) VALUES (#{sendData},#{acceptData}, #{saveTime},#{name},#{sortSendData},#{sortAcceptData},#{updateSuccess});

INSERT INTO mw_mplshistory_weekly (link_name, save_time, send_data, accept_data, week_date, update_success ) VALUES
( #{list.linkName}, #{list.saveTime}, #{list.send}, #{list.accept}, #{list.weekData}, #{list.updateSuccess} )

INSERT INTO mw_mplshistory_monthly (link_name, save_time, send_data, accept_data, month_date, update_success ) VALUES
( #{list.linkName}, #{list.saveTime}, #{list.send}, #{list.accept}, #{list.monthDate}, #{list.updateSuccess} )
mapper.select:
select sort_send_data sendData,sort_accept_data acceptData,link_name linkName from mw_mplshistory_daily where update_success = 1 and save_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and link_name = #{linkName}

select send_data sendData,accept_data acceptData,link_name linkName from mw_mplshistory_daily where update_success = 1 and save_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and link_name = #{linkName}

select send_data send,accept_data accept from mw_mplshistory_weekly where update_success = 1 and week_date = #{weekDate}
and link_name = #{linkName}

select send_data send,accept_data accept from mw_mplshistory_monthly where update_success = 1 and month_date = #{monthDate}
and link_name = #{linkName}
select "report_id" "reportId","report_name" "reportName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_report_down"

#{item}

SELECT t1."type_id" "typeId", t2."drop_value" "dropValue" FROM "mw_label_drop_mapper" t1 LEFT JOIN "mw_dropdown_table" t2 ON t1."drop_tagboard" = t2."drop_id" WHERE "label_id" IN ( SELECT "label_id" FROM "mw_labelmanage_table" WHERE ${TBSNAME}."delete_flag" = 0 AND "label_name" = '位置' ) AND "module_type" = 'ASSETS' AND t1."type_id" IN
#{item}

select "id","assets_id" "hostId","monitor_server_id" "serverId" from "mw_tangibleassets_table" where ${TBSNAME}."delete_flag" = 0 and "id" in
#{item}
